name: @usecapsule/deploy-service
description: Deployment orchestration and infrastructure management bounded context that powers Capsule's Magic Deployâ„¢ capabilities. This service handles the complete deployment lifecycle from repository analysis to production deployment, including framework detection, build orchestration, container management, and Kubernetes resource provisioning. It implements sophisticated monorepo support for Nx, Turborepo, and Lerna, automatically detecting project structures and optimizing build strategies. The service manages deployment strategies (blue-green, canary, rolling), maintains deployment history, handles rollbacks, and coordinates with Kubernetes for actual container orchestration. It owns all deployment-related data including build configurations, deployment status, and resource allocations in its dedicated PostgreSQL database. Communication occurs exclusively through RabbitMQ, processing deployment commands and emitting deployment events for other services to consume.
